Item ID12488

The Bandos kiteshield is a decorated rune kiteshield that is affiliated with the god Bandos, requiring 40 Defence to equip. Sharing the same stats as the rune kiteshield except for the ranged attack bonus and prayer bonus, the Bandos kiteshield also looks visually similar. Its appearance differs in that the shield features an ornamental brown trim.

Players can obtain a Bandos kiteshield as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails. The shield cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-2
 Defence bonuses
+44+48+46-1+46

[[File:Bandos kiteshield detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Bandos kiteshield''' is a decorated [[rune kiteshield]] that is affiliated with the god [[Bandos]], requiring 40 [[Defence]] to equip. Sharing the same stats as the rune kiteshield except for the ranged attack bonus and [[prayer bonus]], the Bandos kiteshield also looks visually similar. Its appearance differs in that the shield features an ornamental brown trim.

Players can obtain a Bandos kiteshield as a reward from completing [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]]. The shield '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill.
